A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi was amazing! Some questions get answered and fans don't like the answers. Some things happen that the fans didn't think should. We've had two years between movies\, and a lot of thoughts and ideas on what is going to happen build up in that amount of time. As an avid fan\, I went in without preconceived notions and absolutely loved it\, and have seen it twice already.
